Situation_of_Risk: New Industrial area, Zone: 81, Street: 7, Building: 150, Qatar. Approximately 22 kilometers away from Hamad International Airport. GPS: N: 25°9’ 30.621’ & E: 51° 24’ 17.697”
Occupation_of_Insured: Supplier and manufacturer of Central Air Conditioning Products
Main_Activities: Manufacturing and assembly of Central Air Conditioning Products, HVAC products, prefabricated ducting, and air distribution ducting networks. Includes storage of raw materials and finished goods (metal sheets, joints, duct accessories, dampers, access doors, filters, grilles, diffusers).
Excess_Deductible: QAR 20,050/- (Material Damage); QAR 5,000/- for each and every loss (Material Damage); 10% of the claim amount subject to a minimum of QAR 25,000/- each and every loss (In respect of Bldg. No. 269, Street No. 9, Zone 81,New Industrial Area)
Climate_Change_Risk: Flash flooding due to heavy rainfall is experienced. Low frequency lighting. Zone 1 for Tornado and Hailstorm exposure. Tsunami risk is very low. Some heavy rainfall damage occurred in the past.

Conditions_Extensions: Architects, Surveyors, Engineers, Legal & Consulting Fees Clause (Professional fees) - Limit: 5% of claim amount subject to maximum of QAR 250,000/- any one occurrence and in the aggregate
Capital Additions Clause - Limit: 10% of sum insured and Declaration within 30 days and additional premium as applicable
Bursting of Pipelines and overflowing of water apparatus (As per LM7 wording)
Burglary Extension following violent/visible/forcible entry/exit from the premises
Property in the open or open sided sheds (other than the structure which are designed to exist/operate in the open or open sided sheds) are covered against fire and/or lightning only
Removal of Debris Clause - Limit: QAR 50,000/- in the aggregate
Onus of Proof of Value Clause
Total liability of the company in any one event or in the aggregate during the period of insurance inclusive of additional clauses shall not exceed the total sum insured stated in this policy.
Exclusions: LOSS OR DAMAGE DUE TO NON-COMPLIANCE OF REGULATIONS
EXCLUDING LOSS AND/OR DAMAGE ARISING OUT OF CONSTRUCTION/ERECTION/FIT-OUT/SNAG WORKS
INDUSTRIES, SEEPAGE, POLLUTION AND CONTAMINATION CLAUSE - NMA 1685
POLITICAL RISKS (WAR/TERRORISM) EXCLUSION ENDORSEMENT NMA 2919 (MRE AMENDMENT)
NUCLEAR ENERGY RISKS EXCLUSION CLAUSE (INSURANCE) (1994) (WORLDWIDE EXCLUDING USA & CANADA) NMA 1975(A)
INSTITUTE RADIOACTIVE CONTAMINATION, CHEMICAL, BIOLOGICAL, BIO-CHEMICAL AND ELECTROMAGNETIC WEAPONS EXCLUSION CLAUSE CL 370 (10/11/03)
CYBER LOSS LIMITED EXCLUSION CLAUSE - LMA 5410
TRANSMISSION AND DISTRIBUTION LINES EXCLUSION CLAUSE
WAR, SABOTAGE, TERRORISM, STRIKES, RIOTS AND CIVIL COMMOTIONS EXCLUSION CLAUSE
MECHANICAL/ELECTRICAL BREAKDOWN OR DERANGEMENT OF MACHINERY OR EQUIPMENT
EXCLUDING CONSEQUENTIAL LOSSES OF ANY NATURE
